Html:
I have a problem with the TypeScript extension for VS 2012 (for Windows 8):

I don't have any syntax highlighting on *.ts files!

 

I have already reinstalled both VS 2012 for Windows 8 and the TypeScript extension (and its *.vsix).

I hvae also posted this on StackOverflow: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/13366580/typescript-syntax-highlighting-for-vs-2012-for-windows-8
I'm going to move this into the issue tracker so that we can more easily help you debug it (and we can track it)
